entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 9 May 2023
